parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Steering Rack and Pinion Mounting Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering rack and pinion mounting can cause the steering wheel to lock, lose control, or become difficult to steer, leading to accidents or near-miss incidents.
symptoms: The steering wheel feels loose or wanders
the vehicle is difficult to steer
the steering wheel locks up
the rack and pinion assembly is loose
the mounting points are stress-fractured
the weld nuts are pulled away
and there is visual cracking around the cross-member area.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Incomplete or delayed recall repairs can lead to continued safety risks, as the underlying issues are not fully addressed, putting drivers and passengers at risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Dealerships refuse to perform recall repairs
citing lack of parts or priority
or perform incomplete repairs
leading to continued safety risks.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering unit can cause the steering wheel to become difficult to turn, leading to accidents or near-miss incidents.
symptoms: The steering wheel is difficult to turn
the power steering unit is defective
and the vehicle is hard to steer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission to engage or disengage properly can cause the vehicle to suddenly move or stall, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Gear lever does not always engage into park
gets stuck in park
jumps out of gear into reverse
vehicle stalls during operation
transmission slips out of gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch assembly can cause the vehicle to suddenly move or lose control, leading to accidents or damage.
symptoms: Clutch assembly breaks off
clutch failure
clutch pedal feels soft or spongy.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission gear train can cause difficulty in shifting gears, leading to loss of control or accidents.
symptoms: Transmission's major gear train failed
making it difficult to change gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: An exhaust leak can cause carbon monoxide to enter the vehicle's cabin, posing a serious health risk to occupants. Additionally, an exhaust leak can lead to decreased engine performance and reduced fuel efficiency.
symptoms: Loud noise from the exhaust system
hissing sound from the exhaust system
smell of exhaust fumes inside the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine stalling can cause loss of vehicle control, especially at high speeds, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: Engine stalls while driving
loss of power
vehicle hesitation
difficulty restarting the engine.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine fires can cause significant damage to the vehicle and pose a serious risk to occupants' safety.
symptoms: Flames or smoke coming from the engine compartment
burning smell
overheating engine
loss of engine power.
